snippet: Jose Reyes, the former Mets shortstop, has begun hitting better. The Marlins were 8-1 on a recent road trip.
abstract: Jose Reyes, the former Mets shortstop, has begun hitting better. The Marlins were 8-1 on a recent road trip.

headline.main: After Difficult Start, Reyes and the Marlins Show Signs of an Awakening
